meanings.definition: Organisms that thrive in high temperatures.
meanings.sent1: Thermophiles can live happily in hot places.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study thermophiles to understand heat-loving organisms.
meanings.sent3: The thermophiles in the hot spring were having a pool party.
meanings.sent4: In the scorching desert, thermophiles are like heat-loving superheroes.
meanings.sent5: The image of thermophiles basking in the sun is unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A type of extremophile that can survive in extreme heat.
meanings.sent2: Thermophiles are extremophiles that love high temperatures.
meanings.sent3: The thermophiles in the sauna were sweating but smiling.
meanings.sent4: In the fiery furnace, thermophiles are the ultimate survivors.
meanings.sent5: The resilience of thermophiles in extreme heat is remarkable.

meanings.definition: Bacteria that can grow at high temperatures.
meanings.sent1: Thermophiles are bacteria that enjoy hot environments.
meanings.sent2: Hot springs are home to many thermophiles.
meanings.sent3: The thermophiles in the oven were baking cookies.
meanings.sent4: In the steaming vents, thermophiles multiply rapidly.
meanings.sent5: The ability of thermophiles to thrive in heat is fascinating.
